DOC.brief_title: Ascending Dose Study Safety Tolerability REGN668 ( SAR231893 ) Normal Healthy Volunteers
DOC.criteria: 1 . Male female 18 65 year age . 2 . Weight > 50 kg < 120 kg . 3 . For woman childbearing potential , negative serum pregnancy test screen visit ( visit 1 ) negative urine pregnancy test day 1 . 4 . Willingness refrain consumption alcohol 24 hour prior study visit . 5 . For men woman childbearing potential , willingness utilize adequate contraception become pregnant ( partner [ ] become pregnant ) full duration study . 6 . Willing , commit , able return ALL clinic visit complete studyrelated procedure . 7 . Able read , understand willing sign inform consent form . 1 . Onset new exercise routine major change previous exercise routine within 4 week prior screen visit . 2 . Pregnant breastfeed woman . 3 . Significant concomitant illness history significant illness cardiac , renal , neurological , endocrinological , metabolic lymphatic disease , illness condition would adversely affect subject 's participation study . 4 . Hospitalization reason within 60 day screen ( visit 1 ) . 5 . Known history Human Immunodeficiency Virus ( HIV ) , Hepatitis B Hepatitis C , and/or positive Hepatitis B surface antigen ( HBsAg ) , positive Hepatitis C antibody ( HCV ) . 6 .
